p: According to the EC Directives, only a processing laboratory recognized as tissue establishment (TE) can release the product and coordinate the transfer to the GMP facility for CAR-T cell manufacturing. JACIE standard identifies the criteria and guidelines for: 1) the receipt of apheretic product; 2) final product (CAR-T product) labeling; 3) final product (CAR-T product) release; 4) final product (CAR-T product) transport; 5) evaluation and training of the personnel.
